pageContext.title: Class 2 Hearing Aid Repair/Replate
pageContext.description: What is Class 2 Hearing Aid Repair?
pageContext.data:
What is Class 2 Hearing Aid Repair?


Class 2 Hearing Aid Repair includes the following options:
  • Class 1 (Basic Repair)
  • Re-installation of original electronics
  • Replacement of a Faceplate and battery door because of damage or defect

Any of these changes offered are always provided at a much greater savings than the purchase of a New Hearing Aid with the same or similar benefits.


When the faceplate is manufactured, there is a hinge pin, which allows for the attachment and functioning of a battery door, is molded into the faceplate. It frequently becomes dislodged and cannot be replaced.


If the Hinge Pin becomes dislodged or otherwise damaged, a repair involves the complete replacement of the Faceplate.


The faceplate may also have to be replaced due to physical damage, abuse, and plastic cracking.
